ProjectTitle: Slow release amorphous solid dispersions to prolong supersaturation in the gastrointestinal tract.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/12/2024
Data: Please include samples/materials that you will analyse in the table, these are physical data in the context of a DMP. Please also specify which analysis you will do, this will help to decide how to document data and to find metadata standards and repositories relevant for your data types. If your data has potential for valorization please contact LRD (https://lrd.kuleuven.be/)
Preservation: Please note that KU Leuven asks for 10 years preservation of all relevant data; the J drive is relatively expensive; the K drive, which is specifically designated for archiving, is a more cost-effective option.
Sharing: you can find guidance that may help you to decide how to share your data here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
